info.name: ROBLOX iOS-Like Blur Theme
info.description: NOTE: Requires Chrome with this flag enabled: chrome://flags/#enable-experimental-web-platform-features ROBLOX iOS-Like Blur Theme This adds a small blur effect to the side navigation bar, and some other elements like dialogs and the chat feature. Similar to the macOS and iOS themes.
info.additionalInfo: NOTE: Requires Chrome with this flag enabled: chrome://flags/#enable-experimental-web-platform-features -------------------------------------- Changelog: Oct 17 2016: Fixed, should work again. May 17 2017: Added some blur for the new avatar editor page, fixed blur on the notification panel not showing. -------------------------------------- Try out my new theme, which replaces the new ROBLOX logo with the old one. style 137531
